snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton, the former secretary of state and potential 2016 presidential candidate, said in a video posted on the Internet Monday that “gay rights are human rights.’’
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton, the former secretary of state and potential 2016 presidential candidate, said in a video posted on the Internet Monday that “gay rights are human rights.’’

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
